Articles.Content:
I have been getting Mono.dll crashes 100% when trying to open KSP.  I have cleared all mods, did a full renistall, verified files, it came back with a "1 file was missing and will be reaquired" and still get the mono.dll crash.

I am trying to send the DxDiag file along with the crash dump, but cannot find anyway to attach the files.  I really don't want to copy and paste the whole things in the post, that would be way to long.  Anyone can help with the attachment would be greatly appreciated.  I love this game and would really like to get back into it.

 

Thanks, Greg
You can submit your logs to pastebin (or similar) and just copy the links on here.
